    • MediaHandler

      public MediaHandler​(File mediaDir, MasterKey masterKey, MainDatabase mainDatabase, UserProfile userProfile)
      Parameters:
      mediaDir - directory where media data is stored ([ANDROID MEDIA DIR]/ch.threema.app/files/data/)
      masterKey - the obtained MasterKey
      mainDatabase - the obtained MainDatabase
      userProfile - the obtained UserProfile information from the app preferences file

  • Method Details

    • saveAllMedia

      public void saveAllMedia​(File outputDir)
      saves avatar files and media to the output directory

      creates the following structure:

      • avatars/user.jpg - user avatar
      • avatars/[nickname].jpg - contact avatars
      • media/[nickname]/[unique file name].* - direct chat media
      • group_avatars/[group name].jpg - group avatars
      • group_media/[group name]/[unique file name].* - group chat media

      unique file name: [4 chars of message uid] - [original file name]

      (since file names may occur multiple times)
